com.iKeirNez.CommunicationsFramework.api.connection

Interface ConnectionManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IConnectionManager

    public interface ConnectionManager
extends Closeable
    Manages a group of connections.
    Author:
    iKeirNez

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHook(HookType hookType, Callback<Connection> callable)
      Consumer which will be called when something happens
      List<Connection> getConnections()
      Gets the connections associated with this manager
      boolean isListenerRegistered(PacketListener packetListener)
      Checks if a listener is registered
      AuthenticatedClientConnection newAuthenticatedClientConnection(String serverAddress, int port, char[] key)
      Returns a new instance of an authenticated client connection
      AuthenticatedServerConnection newAuthenticatedServerConnection(String clientAddress, int port, char[] key)
      Returns a new instance of an authenticated server connection
      ClientConnection newClientConnection(String serverAddress, int port)
      Returns a new instance of a client connection
      ServerConnection newServerConnection(String clientAddress, int port)
      Returns a new instance of a server connection
      void registerListener(PacketListener packetListener)
      Registers an instance as being a listener, any packets received from linked Connection will be passed to applicable methods Methods must have the PacketHandler annotation Methods have an optional first parameter IConnection and a required second parameter implementing Packet
      void unregisterListener(PacketListener packetListener)
      Un-registers a listener instance

        close

    • Method Detail

      • getConnections

        List<Connection> getConnections()
        Gets the connections associated with this manager
        Returns:
        The connections associated with this manager

      • newClientConnection

        ClientConnection newClientConnection(String serverAddress,
                                     int port)
        Returns a new instance of a client connection
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - The address of the server we should connect to
        port - The port we should use to connect
        Returns:
        The Client Connection

      • newAuthenticatedClientConnection

        AuthenticatedClientConnection newAuthenticatedClientConnection(String serverAddress,
                                                               int port,
                                                               char[] key)
        Returns a new instance of an authenticated client connection
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - The address of the server we should connect to
        port - The port we should use to connect
        key - The key to authenticate with, this should be the same as the one on the server-side
        Returns:
        The Authenticated Client Connection

      • newServerConnection

        ServerConnection newServerConnection(String clientAddress,
                                     int port)
        Returns a new instance of a server connection
        Parameters:
        clientAddress - The address of the client which we will accept connections from (null or empty string to allow any address)
        port - The port we should listen on
        Returns:
        The Server Connection

      • newAuthenticatedServerConnection

        AuthenticatedServerConnection newAuthenticatedServerConnection(String clientAddress,
                                                               int port,
                                                               char[] key)
        Returns a new instance of an authenticated server connection
        Parameters:
        clientAddress - The address of the client which we will accept connections from (null or empty string to allow any address)
        port - The port we should listen on
        key - The key to authenticate with, this will be matched against the clients version
        Returns:
        The Authenticated Server Connection

      • registerListener

        void registerListener(PacketListener packetListener)
        Registers an instance as being a listener, any packets received from linked Connection will be passed to applicable methods Methods must have the PacketHandler annotation Methods have an optional first parameter IConnection and a required second parameter implementing Packet
        Parameters:
        packetListener - The instance we should register and pass packets to

      • isListenerRegistered

        boolean isListenerRegistered(PacketListener packetListener)
        Checks if a listener is registered
        Parameters:
        packetListener - The listener to check for being registered
        Returns:
        Register status

      • unregisterListener

        void unregisterListener(PacketListener packetListener)
        Un-registers a listener instance
        Parameters:
        packetListener - The listener instance to un-register

      • addHook

        void addHook(HookType hookType,
             Callback<Connection> callable)
        Consumer which will be called when something happens
        Parameters:
        hookType - The type of hook to listen for
        callable - The Callback object to be called
